common_params: [{"name":"partner_id","type":"int","sample":"1","description":"Partner ID is assigned upon registration is successful. Required for all requests."},{"name":"timestamp","type":"timestamp","sample":"1610000000","description":"This is to indicate the timestamp of the request. Required for all requests. Expires in 5 minutes."},{"name":"access_token","type":"string","sample":"c09222e3fc40ffb25fc947f738b1abf1","description":"The token for API access, using to identify your permission to the api. Valid for multiple use and expires in 4 hours."},{"name":"user_id","type":"int","sample":"1","description":"Shopee's unique identifier for a user."},{"name":"sign","type":"string","sample":"e318d3e932719916a9f9ebb57e2011961bd47abfa54a36e040d050d8931596e2","description":"Signature generated by(depends on different APIs) partner_id, api path, timestamp, access_token,  user_id and partner_key via HMAC-SHA256 hashing algorithm."}]
define: Get real-time indicator data of the live stream room, including the number of likes, comments, shares, views, etc. (Only for TW, ID, TH)

error_list.name: error_data
error_list.description: The session(session_id:{{sid}}) is not belong to you

error_list.name: error_server
error_list.description: The API is not supported for current region

error_list.name: error_server
error_list.description: Too many requests, please try again later

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: The information you queried is not found.

params:
{"request_params":[{"description":"

The identifier of livestream session.

","name":"session_id","sample":"6236215","type":"int64","required":"True","key":"ikZfPRk"}],"response_params":[{"name":"error","type":"string","sample":"","description":"

Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

","key":"MDkRMGd"},{"description":"

Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

","name":"message","sample":"","type":"string","required":null,"key":"mtRKEKy"},{"description":"

The identifier for an API request for error tracking.

","name":"request_id","sample":"e3e3e7f3360690a5b55f0689f8a4e801","type":"string","required":null,"key":"iJNydsH"},{"description":"

Detail informations you are querying.

","name":"response","sample":"","type":"object","required":null,"key":"EWZpKxC","children":[{"description":"

Value of placed orders (paid and unpaid) during Livestream, including sales from cancelled orders.

","name":"gmv","sample":"1.0","type":"float","required":null,"key":"kwMyPEw"},{"description":"

Number of \"Add To Cart\" button clicked for all products in the orange bag during livestream.

","name":"atc","sample":"1","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"inCXBmd"},{"description":"

Number of products clicks divided by Number of Livestream views.

","name":"ctr","sample":"0.1","type":"float","required":null,"key":"kxEZCni"},{"description":"

Amount of product orders from the stream divided by Amount of product clicks from the stream.

","name":"co","sample":"0.1","type":"float","required":null,"key":"sdbXGsP"},{"description":"

Number of placed orders (paid and unpaid) during Livestream, including cancelled orders.

","name":"orders","sample":"1","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"ycmjXWy"},{"description":"

Number of viewers during stream.

","name":"ccu","sample":"1","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"eAnmtmR"},{"description":"

Number of Concurrent viewers in the stream that have watched for more than 1 minute.

","name":"engage_ccu_1m","sample":"1","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"XcbcbrZ"},{"description":"

Highest number of viewers during stream.

","name":"peak_ccu","sample":"1","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"eHfYHSM"},{"description":"

Number of \"Like\" clicked during livestream.

","name":"likes","sample":"1","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"WYXkJPY"},{"description":"

Number of comments acquired during the stream.

","name":"comments","sample":"1","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"ZtiJMSE"},{"description":"

Number of shares created during the stream.

","name":"shares","sample":"1","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"TtkTHzB"},{"description":"

Number of views from the stream.

","name":"views","sample":"1","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"FfDRfCx"},{"description":"

Average of Viewer duration watching in the stream.

","name":"avg_viewing_duration","sample":"1","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"bCJXHyt"}]}]}
